changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "document_requests" ( "id" SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "requester_id" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, -- Keycloak user ID of the requester "status" VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'PENDING', "reviewed_by" VARCHAR(255), "approved_by" VARCHAR(255), "created_at" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "generated_document_id" INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY ("generated_document_id") REFERENCES "files" ("id") );
